DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal project develop sensitive objective clinical research tool assessment postural control trunk . In order accomplish goal , aim quantify balance performance unstable seat task . Specifically , investigator quantify balance performance low back pain participant osteopathic manipulative treatment . The investigator hypothesize significant improvement balance performance single session osteopathic manipulative treatment well 4 session osteopathic manipulative treatment improvement great learn effect . A secondary objective study quantify difference patient-oriented outcome measure ( e.g. , self-reported pain , disability ) low back pain participant osteopathic manipulative treatment . The investigator hypothesize significant improvement self-reported outcome follow osteopathic manipulative treatment . The association improvement postural control parameter patient-oriented measure also explore .
DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment Postural Control : Systems Engineering Approach
DOC.criteria: All participant must meet inclusion criterion participate study . Below list inclusion criterion LBP participant : Age 2165 year Independently ambulatory Able speak read English Able understand study procedure comply entire length study . Willing randomize either immediate delayed treatment group . Musculoskeletal pain primarily low back region Pain rating equal great 3 of10 indicate Numeric Rating Scale Pain Disability equal great 26 % indicated Oswestry Disability Questionnaire All candidate meet exclusion criterion baseline exclude study participation . Exclusion criterion selfreported . However , treatment session , physicians watch clinical sign symptom consistent physical finding suggestive presence exclusion criterion . In case , treatment discontinue subject exclude . Below list exclusion criterion : Inability unwillingness individual give write informed consent . Physical therapy form manual medicine ( e.g. , Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine , Chiropractic Manipulation , etc . ) , acupuncture spinal injection within one month prior study enrollment Workers ' compensation benefit past 3 month ongoing medical legal issue Possibly pregnant Obesity ( BMI > 32 ) Currently use electrical implant ( e.g. , cardiac pacemaker , drug delivery pump , etc . ) History : Spinal surgery Spinal fracture Spinal infection ( e.g. , osteomyelitis ) Cancer Unresolved symptom : Head trauma Inner ear infection associate balance coordination problem Orthostatic hypotension Uncontrolled hypertension Vestibular disorder ( e.g . vertigo ) Current diagnosis : Significant spinal deformity ( e.g. , scoliosis > 20 degree , torticollis ) Ankylosing spondylitis Spondylolisthesis grade III IV Cauda equine syndrome Rheumatoid arthritis Osteoporosis Angina congestive heart failure symptom Active bleed infection back Blindness Seizures Neurologic disease ( e.g. , Parkinson 's disease , multiple sclerosis , cerebral palsy , Alzheimer 's disease , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , stroke transient ischemic attack past year , cervical dystonia ) Conditions recognize physician time study : Significant worsening sign neurologic deficit Symptoms consistent mechanical finding Other condition impede protocol implementation
